I really enjoyed the film. The beginning is painfully slow. But it is a plot device. The ending left me a bit dissatisfied.

Also, I was worried it wouldn't be in English or would have subs because the opening credits were all in Italian and no one talked for a really long time. It did make it more interesting waiting to find out!
Thanks for this movie. For the first time in many months I was able to go to sleep without taking my sleeping pills.

When I put it on I thought it was broke because it just shows you a car driving round for about 3 minutes (which is pretty long and boring in film terms).... I had to fastforward that bit, oh and also the two pole dancers dancing reeeeaaaaalllyyy slowly for an ENTIRE song, it bored me. At first I was like Ohh yeah, nice women... then i just got bored.

Then he drives round pointlessly, follows a woman in another car for about a minute, then goes home! 


That's all I could take, I was falling asleep, it had been 20-25 minutes and if a film can't grab your attention from the start then it's not worth watching!
